category: Articles of Incorporation/Article 31 (Disposal and Management of Property)
contents: Article 31 (Disposal and Management of Assets) ① When the Foundation wishes to sell, donate, exchange, change the use of, or provide as collateral the basic assets stipulated in Article 4, Paragraph 2, or when it wishes to bear the burden of an obligation or waive a right, the Board of Directors Approval must be obtained from the Minister of Education after passing a resolution., ② The maintenance, preservation, and other management of basic property and ordinary property (excluding the cases of paragraph 1) shall be determined by the chairman of the board. Revised November 5, 2020, ③ If there is a change in the list or valuation of basic assets, the attached list of Article 4, Paragraph 3 must be changed and the Articles of Incorporation amendment procedure must be followed.
